The papist represented, and not misrepresented being in answer to the first sheet of the second part of the Papist misrepresented and represented : and for a further vindication of the catechism truly representing the doctrine and practices of the Church of Rome. Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
[2], 14 p.
Printed for Ric. Chiswell ..., London : 1687.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Attributed to John Williams. cf. BM.
=======
